001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.bitcoind;
002
003import org.slf4j.Logger;
004import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
005import org.bitcoinj.utils.AppDataDirectory;
006
007import java.io.File;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.nio.charset.Charset;
010import java.nio.file.Files;
011import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
012import java.util.List;
013
014/**
015 * Utility class with (extremely limited) parsing of {@code bitcoin.conf}
016 * <p>
017 * Currently focused on just getting connection info
018 * <p>
019 * Currently ignores `[Sections]`.
020 */
021public class BitcoinConfFile {
022    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BitcoinConfFile.class);
023    private static final String BITCOINAPPNAME = "Bitcoin";
024    private final File file;
025
026    public BitcoinConfFile() {
027        this(AppDataDirectory.getPath(BITCOINAPPNAME).resolve("bitcoin.conf").toFile());
028    }
029
030    public BitcoinConfFile(File confFile) {
031        file = confFile;
032    }
033
034    public static BitcoinConf readDefaultConfig() {
035        return new BitcoinConfFile().readWithFallback();
036    }
037
038    //
039
040    /**
041     * Read a `bitcoin.conf` file
042     *
043     * @return The configuration object
044     */
045    public BitcoinConf read() throws IOException {
046        List<String> lines = Files.readAllLines(file.toPath(), Charset.defaultCharset() );
047        return parseLines(lines);
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Try to read `.conf` file, fallback to defaults on error
052     *
053     * If any exception occurs we return default values
054     * TODO: maybe we should only return defaults on fileNotFound or accessDenied, etc.
055     * 
056     * @return Configuration read or defaults if read error
057     */
058    public BitcoinConf readWithFallback() {
059        BitcoinConf conf = new BitcoinConf();
060        setDefaults(conf);
061
062        try {
063            conf = read();
064        } catch (IOException e) {
065            if (e instanceof NoSuchFileException) {
066                log.warn("NoSuchFileException: " + file.getAbsolutePath()   );
067            } else {
068                log.error("Error reading " + file.getAbsolutePath() + ": " + e.getMessage());
069                e.printStackTrace();
070            }
071        }
072        return conf;
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Not-very-well tested parsing of Bitcoin.conf (or similar) file
077     * 
078     * @param lines An array of one-line-Strings from the file
079     * @return a BitcoinConf object
080     */
081    private BitcoinConf parseLines(List<String> lines) {
082        BitcoinConf conf = new BitcoinConf();
083        for (String line : lines) {
084            if (!line.startsWith("#")) {
085                String trimmed = line.split("#")[0].trim();
086                String[] kv = trimmed.split("=");
087                if (kv.length == 2) {
088                    conf.put(kv[0], kv[1]);
089                }
090
091            }
092        }
093        return conf;
094    }
095
096    private void setDefaults(BitcoinConf conf) {
097        conf.put("rpcconnect", "127.0.0.1");
098        conf.put("rpcport", "8332");
099        conf.put("rpcuser", "");
100        conf.put("rpcpassword", "");
101    }
102}
